baseOutcome.title: Dynamic Ownership
baseOutcome.description: AngoraSix helps determine how much value each person contributes to the project. A practical tool to apply a contribution-based ownership model — ideal for partners and for recognizing or motivating committed team members.

outcome1.title: Shared Decisions Based on Real Contributions
outcome1.description: A governance system that weights votes according to ownership or any model you define — fair, without arbitrary hierarchies or partner conflicts.

outcome2.title: Simple and Transparent Income Distribution
outcome2.description: Income is distributed based on contributions and agreed rules, using a shared, secure wallet. Everyone receives what they truly deserve.
outcome2.imageAlt: Fund distribution screen showing automatic payments by contribution
